channel.title: photography on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in photography on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Apple Aperture updates to 3.1.2
item.description: Apple has updated its Aperture software to 3.1.2 - it seems to focus on the new users who quite likely brought the Appstore copy.

item.title: Aperture 3 digital photo software improved integration with Flickr
item.description: I’ve been using Apple Aperture 3 for my digital photography and image processing for a couple of years.

item.title: Autodesk SketchBook Mobile comes to Android
item.description: SketchBook Mobile recently got a mention here as the best iPad app fro sketches, notes, photos and more - and now its available on Android.

item.title: Best iPad App for design and graphics gets better
item.description: Sketchbook Pro, in my opinion is the best iPad app for photo editing, graphic and web design.
